The three relevant papers are below.

- Clifford, Scott, Thomas Leeper, and Carlisle Rainey. "Generalizing Survey Experiments Using Topic Sampling: An Application to Party Cues." Forthcoming in *Political Behavior*. [[Journal](https://doi.org/10.1007/s11109-023-09870-1)] [[Ungated](../../papers/gte.pdf)]
- Clifford, Scott and Carlisle Rainey. "Estimators for Topic-Sampling Designs." [[Preprint](https://osf.io/preprints/socarxiv/7ady6/)]
- Clifford, Scott and Carlisle Rainey. "The Limits of Single-Topic Experiments." [[Preprint](https://osf.io/zaykd)]
